item.description:
Come experience the transformational power of a crystal singing bowl meditation


Please share this event with your friends, family & acquaintances.  I love sharing this amazing healing sound with you to help raise your vibration, raise the vibration of our communities and the world.

I will be using seven bowls tuned to each of the primary chakras in the energy body to balance and promote emotional well-being. The meditation will start with guided imagery and go into the playing of the bowls.

 

Their vibrations will be felt throughout your entire body creating a beautiful resonance.

Crystal Singing Bowl Meditation is a powerful healing tool that gently promotes health, balance and transformation in your life! Crystal Singing Bowls are made of 99.9% pure lead crystal; when played, they produce a beautiful wave of healing sound and vibration. As these waves pass over and through you and you will begin to shift physically, mentally and spiritually, experiencing a greater sense of peace, harmony and vitality

This beautiful meditation is deeply relaxing and therapeutic No experience required! You will leave feeling relaxed and rejuvenated.

You may rest laying down or may sit as the healing vibration of the Bowls penetrates deeply into your body, with overall effects unique to each individual.

Clinical studies have shown that Crystal Singing Bowls can lower heart rate and blood pressure, stimulate the immune system, reduce stress hormones, reduce pain and stimulate the production of endorphins, the bodies natural pain killers!

Come surrender to the healing vibrations while resting comfortably supported by yoga props (bolsters & blankets) in a restorative posture.



 

 

Please bring a mat, blanket and pillow for your comfort, I also provide all three if needed.  Call Darnell with any questions at 857-526-2200
item.name: Crystal Singing Bowl Meditation with Darnell
